name: The burend tunnels
description:
Everything is broken in the html version(no a serious submission)


You are stuck in some old tunnels with only your hypnotizing flashlight, but on nose there are evil zombies trying to kill you use you magic flashlight to brainwash- i mean cooperate with them to go further down the dungeon by finding the keys and killing enemy zombies to get stronger.

Controls

left mouse: use hypnotizing flashlight

right mouse: mark target

move: wasd or arrow keys

credits

was used for most of the sprites

other

I will be honest this game is very broken has no sound and is not to fun and barely complete i just uploaded this small prototype so i have had a submission to the jam
